introduction: This film’s Online Screening is available in the United States Only, requires an RSVP, and is viewable in the SXSW TV app ONLY. Once you’ve secured your RSVP, watch this film starting at 9am CT on Thursday, March 17, 2022 through 9am CT on Saturday, March 19, 2022, on the SXSW TV app ONLY. Learn how to RSVP for SXSW Online Screenings:https://www.sxsw.com/how-to-rsvp-for-sxsw-online-screenings/“The Big Conn” is a four-part documentary series that tells the unbelievable true story of the larger-than-life attorney, Eric C. Conn, who stole over half a billion dollars in the largest Social Security fraud case in history.
